localizedMeta.description:
Run and jump to make your way across Antarctica in this thrilling, action-packed game! It upgrades at last!


Using the simple controls, keep on running and don't look back! Bound over hills and barrel through valleys, but beware of the ground crumbling away at your feet!

Acquire the item and make the gauge full. The 2nd stage can be played if it runs 300 m or more. Let's avoid the rival "AKAPEN" and aim at the world longest mileage.

Package size: 7959 KB - More storage space required for install

Compatibility information:
Number of players for local play: 1 Player

Supported interfaces/sensors
- Touchscreen

Supported languages:
English(United States)/English(United Kingdom)/Japanese

Copyright (C) 2012 BoobyTrap.,Ltd. All Rights Reserved.

Using the simple controls, keep on running and don't look back! Bound over hills and barrel through valleys, but beware of the ground crumbling away at your feet!

Run and jump to make your way across Antarctica in this thrilling, action-packed game! It upgrades at last!


Using the simple controls, keep on running and don't look back! Bound over hills and barrel through valleys, but beware of the ground crumbling away at your feet!

Acquire the item and make the gauge full. The 2nd stage can be played if it runs 300 m or more. Let's avoid the rival "AKAPEN" and aim at the world longest mileage.

南極大陸横断を目指して走り抜ける
爽快ランニング＆ジャンピングアクションゲーム！
「トビペン」がセカンドステージを実装して、遂にバージョンアップ！

変わらないシンプルな操作と、どこまでも走り続けるゲーム性で
丘を越え谷を越え、崩れゆく地面を走り抜けろ。

追加されたアイテム魚をGETすると、一定時間ゲージが満タン状態に！
更に300m以上疾走すれば、セカンドステージがプレイ可能に！
ライバル「アカペン」をかわして、目指せ世界最長疾走距離

コンテンツ容量: 7959 KB

プレイ人数: 1人

対応機能:
- タッチスクリーン

対応言語:
英語(アメリカ)/英語(イギリス)/日本語

著作権等:
Copyright (C) 2012 BoobyTrap.,Ltd. All Rights Reserved.
